steganography

Class Key

  • java.lang.Object
    • steganography.Key

  • public class Key
extends java.lang.Object
    This module generates the key for encryption of the text that we would be embedding into the image. As here we use the Diffie Hellman key exchange algorithm which has a symmetric key approach, there must be a public key made by both encoder and decoder from which they make their shared secret key for encryption and decryption of text message.

      int Skey(int PrimeNo, int PrivateKey, java.lang.String Path)
      This function creates the shared secret key for the user by reading the public key of the other user from his file and use the prime number and the private key of the user received as input parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Key

        public Key()

    • Method Detail

      • pubkey

        public int pubkey(int PrimeNo,
                  int PrimitiveRoot,
                  java.lang.String Path)
           throws java.io.IOException
        This function takes the prime number and its primitive root modulo as the input parameters. Firstly, it generates a random private key for the user and then his public key is generated of the form: Public key = (root^privateKey)%primeNo. This is then written back into a file for the reference of the user at other end.
        Parameters:
        PrimeNo - Prime Number
        PrimitiveRoot - Primitive Root of that Prime Number
        Path - The Path to which the public key should be saved
        Returns:
        The Public Key
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • Skey

        public int Skey(int PrimeNo,
                int PrivateKey,
                java.lang.String Path)
         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                java.io.IOException
        This function creates the shared secret key for the user by reading the public key of the other user from his file and use the prime number and the private key of the user received as input parameters. The shared secret key is of the form: key = (public key^privateKey)%primeNo. This value is then returned back by the function.
        Parameters:
        PrimeNo - Prime Number
        PrivateKey - The Private Key of Encoder/Decoder
        Path - The Path where the Public Key is saved
        Returns:
        The Shared Secret Key
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
